title: Who Needs Boys?
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B0064TIZFI.Meet Allie Morrison, the girl every boy wants to date. Every boy except one, that is.This was supposed to be the best summer of Allie's life. Instead, she's lugging vegetables around at a farm stand, partnered with a boy who thinks she's useless.Sure, she's noticed that Tad has the best smile. Yes, she's a little jealous of how well her friends get along with him.But that's okay, right? She wants a mature guy. Preferably someone in college, certainly not some random high school sophomore who doesn’t even have a car. And she has never wasted her time on a guy who isn't interested.Except her friends think Tad is perfect for her, and Allie is beginning to agree. Problem is, she has no clue how to win over a guy who thinks she's invisible. What’s a girl got to do to get herself a boyfriend?
author: Stephie Davis
